website_summaries.verdict: Responsive cushioning and comfortable coverage are important aspects of an Asics running shoe. The 2nd version of the Gel Evate provides such conveniences to runners who aim to be at their best when performing. Underfoot support and gait efficiency mechanics add stability to those who have under-pronated foot motion.
pros: The mesh upper covers the foot comfortably, while also remaining breathable
Synthetic overlays that are stitched onto the upper provide a snug and secure fit
The insole is cushioned, so it adds a bit more underfoot comfort
it can easily be replaced, as well
The mid-sole unit utilizes a full-length foam that’s comfortable and very responsive to the performance needs of the wearer
Many runners welcomed the durable nature of the Asics Gel Evate 2, which allowed them to use it many times without worrying about wear and tear
The overall quality of this shoe, from the coverage to the cushioning, has been lauded by many testers
cons: A few runners thought that the Asics Gel Evate 2 was a bit wide around the heel and mid-foot, which made their feet wobbly inside it
Some felt that it looked uncomfortably bulky for their tastes

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes i haver ever bought and worn !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fit . My feet feels so comfortable in them they don't hurt. price was a little high but they are the best shoes I have found in a asics . I would highly buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Running on Jelly clouds
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are lovely. I tried them on art DSW but they were TOOOO EXPENSIVE. Amazon had them $50 cheaper. Nice! So I bought them. They are nice and roomy in the toe as far as running shoes go, which I like. And seriously you can feel the gel in there when you are running. It is like squishy clouds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of Asics. The first pair was recommended by my foot doctor when I had Plantar fasciitis. I replaced the insoles with powerstep orthotics and they are the best walking shoes. I put these on right out of the box. At first the right shoe felt larger so I had to adjust the shoelaces for a few days until I wore them a while. Now they fit perfect and I love the colors and purple laces. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lightseeker

customer_reviews.title: Really love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Gel-Evate 2 because I always buy ASICS shoes. I am very happy with this purchase. The are so comfortable and fit pretty true to size. If you were running you should probably buy a half size larger. I use them to walk and they are perfect. Couldn't be happier with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: The colors are great and the shoe looks good
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews about the shoe running small and to order 1/2 size larger. I ordered 1/2 size larger and it was still too small. I don't if it would have fitted even if I had ordered a full size larger. I own over ten pairs of Asics and have never had a problem with sizing. The colors are great and the shoe looks good. I returned the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: sanbow

customer_reviews.title: Love Asics but these are too narrow even for my narrow feet!
customer_reviews.text: Returning these as the length is ok but width wise they are very tight. I have narrow feet so I rarely ever have width issues. I have always ordered asics in this size so I'm not sure if this I'd a bad pair or it is this specific type. I will be ordering another pair but it is back to the nimbus or the keyano for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Pup

customer_reviews.title: Great for the value. Runs a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: These are great sneakers. I only wear them to exercise for about an hour and a half a day. However, when the removable support is in the sneaker, the sneaker feels tight and is a bit small. If you remove the inside liner then the sneaker fits better and is comfortable. I am hoping once I wear them and break them in they will feel less tight when the liner is in. So I would suggest purchasing a half size bigger than your normal size unless you plan on removing the inside support.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Winters

customer_reviews.title: order a half size up!
customer_reviews.text: I went by the previous reviewers recommendations as well as personal experience in buying a few pairs of Asics Nimbus' via Amazon before and ordered a half size up. No way would have my normal size 10 fit, these definitely run small. Satisfies with my purchase, snagged them at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfTwinGirls

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size up per reviews. Much smaller than reviews mentioned. I have a medium width foot. Laces with my foot in shoe came to edges of the tongue. Chose to return and shop locally afraid to try another size. Loved color and it did seen the sole/cushioning was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lumpkin

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and functional kicks
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the original pair I had ordered a half size big and get a pair a full size big. Other than that they are very comfortable. I run 3 miles with no problems and also do various exercise classes with lots of comfort and support. Love the looks of these shoes too the colors really pop.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria White

customer_reviews.title: but my daughter liked them and wanted to wear them for gym class ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for myself, but my daughter liked them and wanted to wear them for gym class in high school. She said they make her feel like she is floating and make her feel like she has to run, not walk.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette B.

customer_reviews.title: Go up a half size compared to your other Asics!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable & cushiony. This is my 2nd pair of Gel-Evate 2, but I had to get a half size larger in this color for some reason?! Great price & super comfortable for jogging & boot camp/cross-training.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: While they are not as cushiony comfortable as my previous Gel-evates
customer_reviews.text: As with other reviewers, I ordered a 1/2 size larger than my regular size, and they fit perfectly. While they are not as cushiony comfortable as my previous Gel-evates, they are still great and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W. Heath

customer_reviews.title: LOVE. I've had a terrible time finding sneakers
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. I've had a terrible time finding sneakers. Plantar fasciitis makes so many sneakers uncomfortable. These are great! So cushy! I found my new favorites!
customer_reviews.author: A. King

customer_reviews.title: These are my first pair and I love them. They are very comfy with plenty of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair and I love them. They are very comfy with plenty of width. I noted they were small because I wear a 10.5 and I ordered an 11 since others suggested ordering up. My toes brush the front of the shoe. It's not uncomfortable and I like them in all other aspects. I have a wider foot but these fit that fine. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Binks & Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I over-pronate so these shoes work really well for me. Anytime I buy athletic shoes I always go up a half of a size. so I would definitely recommend everyone to do this when buying this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: RJKing

customer_reviews.title: Similar to Nimbus, narrower toe box though.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional cushioning and stability, similar to the Nimbus, but unfortunately, narrower in the toe box than Nimbus so these just don't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Cloud-walking!
customer_reviews.text: Great support - like walking on clouds. They run a lot smaller than the last 10 or so pairs I've purchased of various styles Asics @ Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Princhessa

customer_reviews.title: I like these and the Nimbus they are like walking on ...
customer_reviews.text: I work in a retail setting on my feet for many hours on hard floors. ASICS are the only shoes I have found that keep my feet from hurting. I like these and the Nimbus they are like walking on a cloud!
customer_reviews.author: tmb47

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy construction.
customer_reviews.text: I received this shoe on July 1, 2015. I wore it for one hour Jazzercise classes 4-5 times per week. I only wore them during class. After 4 months part of the sole tread has separated from the shoe creating a tripping hazard. I cannot return the item as the return period has elapsed and Amazon does not seem to offer any way to return defective items. (At lease I can't seem to locate it online.)
customer_reviews.author: Ginger G.

customer_reviews.title: Love my ASICS
customer_reviews.text: Love ASICS. I can wear them without a break in period. Insoles come out so I can put my custom orthotics in (so I can't really speak to arch support on the shoes as sold).
customer_reviews.author: Laura C Breckheimer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered another size up 9 1/2 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9. The shoe fit ok, but my big toe felt smushed in the toe area. I ordered another size up 9 1/2 and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Ran small compared to other asics.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great quality but they ran small. I've had few pairs of asics shoes and always wear an 8.5. I need a 9. So you might order a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. I went on a 3 mile walk today to check them out. They were great. My knees didn't hurt at all by the time I was done. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grey

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid runner! I love these shoes, Asics are wide enough for my feet. They come a little tight, but stretch out over a few runs.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: live these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I live this shoe.,I have severe feet issues and finding a shoe that works with my messed up feet is hard to do. And the price is amazing. I have the exact same shoe that I paid $145 for at a local retailer. Definitely worth every penny at either price
customer_reviews.author: Jane Rue

customer_reviews.title: The support is good but it fits smaller than what a size 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: The support is good but it fits smaller than what a size 8 usually is. After running 2+ miles my right big toe starts to fall asleep. I recommend you buy at least a half size bigger than usual with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Macias

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Super cushiony shoe. Love them but they run small. Ordered a half size bigger and need a while size bigger. Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Scott

customer_reviews.title: One was about a size 8 the left one was ...
customer_reviews.text: One was about a size 8 the left one was about 7 1/2. They were supposed to be size 9. They were marked as size 9 in both shoes.
customer_reviews.author: RAS

customer_reviews.title: Shirlee
customer_reviews.text: Love the color--basically black with bright trim. I wore these the first day and they were very comfortable. Good buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: S. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Not my usual Asics. Too narrow for my narrow ...
customer_reviews.text: Not my usual Asics. Too narrow for my narrow foot, not the sole, but the top of the shoe pinches across my toes. Some extra fabric inside, but all in all cut somewhat tighter across the toes than usual. I have never had a pair of Asics that didn't fit. Of course I didn't notice until I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Holwerk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they are good. but i wore it in summer,maybe when the fall comes, it will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Five stars because there are no negatives I can think of. Colors were better than photos. They have helped for long days at work. I have been wearing them for about 10 days and hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Third pair because I love them so much!
customer_reviews.text: Have had three pair of these shoes now. I am training for a marathon and just bought the third pair to wear during the marathon. I am sad that Ascis got rid of these because I haven't found a suitable replacement yet.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these I have had. I ordered a half size bigger and they are perfect. Would've liked more color selection, but these are fine. Shoes last well. I am not a runner, but wslk 5 + miles per day.
customer_reviews.author: Anne E. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: I found the size 6 fit my size 5 feet ...
customer_reviews.text: I found the size 6 fit my size 5 feet just right, thanks to the reviews plus my one previous return. I only wish they had a higher arch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a fan of ASICS but after wearing once the tounge inside the shoe rolled and is now highly uncomfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gadbois

customer_reviews.title: not my favorite. They will be used for cross training
customer_reviews.text: They remind me of the Nimbus 15, not my favorite. They will be used for cross training. I will continue my search for the perfect running shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: This model runs small
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice shoe with great cushion but this model runs small. I returned the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: UTGypsy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!! Instantly comfortable. On my feet all day as an RN and my feet did not hurt.
customer_reviews.author: RebEl73

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would order a half size larger. They run small for some odd reason.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but runs very small. Fortunately I had tried on a pair in a shoe store before ordering so knew to order a whole size bigger than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Runs one size too small, had to return it twice. Finally just ordered the same one I had before.
customer_reviews.author: SAL TANKER

customer_reviews.title: I'm a 7. 5 in every shoe brand, ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 7.5 in every shoe brand, even my other Asics but unfortunately these weren't made right. 7.5 is soooo small it's really ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I have had foot issues for the past several years to the point of having custom made orthotics. These Asics fit so amazing I don't even need my orthotics most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Z F F

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: too small and I have always wore a 7.5 in this brand
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Gentile-jerry

customer_reviews.title: Go 1/2 size larger than normal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but expect to order up at least half shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Brent G

customer_reviews.title: Order half-size up... Had to return.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to really like them but they did not fit to size, they felt a half size too small then marked. The colors look much better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Great value
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7.5, but needfed the 8 in this shoe. Very comfortable. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: mvd2mi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this shoe and it provides great comfort and support
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kolb

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: I have always worn the gel - nimbus these are just the same ...love them
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: but love them
customer_reviews.text: Had to exchange for bigger size, but love them now
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Had to return these shoes. Usually wear an 8 ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these shoes. Usually wear an 8 1/2 in Asics, but these ran a 1/2 size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I love them! Asics come through once again
customer_reviews.text: Ran a little smal, had to send back for a larger size, but I love them! Asics come through once again!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna C. Hacker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. You do have to size up half a size like other reviewers posted.
customer_reviews.author: shoe lover

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I needed a new pair of walking shoes. I have tried different brands of shoes. So I decided to give these a try. I have had these now for about a month. They seem to be doing a good job. Nice and comfortable and good on the arch. I need to get shoes with good arch support. As much as I walk. If they can last up to about 9 months. Then they are doing good.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes..a little smaller than my previous pair...I have owned several pairs and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They felt very comfy but sadly ran a Half size small.
customer_reviews.author: rrw

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. First pair toe hit end so had to order 1/2 size up from normal.
customer_reviews.author: Internet Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! So comfortable I can wear all day, and I like the colors, not too neon.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8.5 and I ordered an 8.5 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: ... did order a half size up and they fit perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I did order a half size up and they fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: Buy at least 1 whole size bigger
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice pair of shoes, but I bought a 8.5 (usually an 8) and my foot barely fit in it. I sold it to someone who usually wears a size 7-7.5. I then bought a size 9 and it's still too small. Oh well...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gel-evate 2: makes running fun!!
customer_reviews.text: These are like running on a cloud. The extra gel makes these shoes incredibly comfortable. I loved them so much that I bought another pair in a different color. I fall between a 6.5-7. I ordered a 7 and they fit perfectly. I'm all about the cushion and comfort, so these are ideal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit pretty good but I have narrow heels and they were ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit pretty good but I have narrow heels and they were too wide in the heel. Also I didn't feel enough arch support. The length and width were fine but I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: indigal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Worth the price. I am really glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Canyongirl

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a women's size 8 when I received they were too small. So I had to go up a 1/2 size. I recommend going up at least 1/2 size with these shoes. The shoes are ultra comfy especially for running.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wiers

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is great! I was instructed to get my running shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great! I was instructed to get my running shoe 1 size larger and it fits perfectly! It feels like running on clouds!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Collier

customer_reviews.title: This is my third pair of Asics and I love them. I teach preschool and am on my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Asics and I love them. I teach preschool and am on my feet all day. The shoes fit great and the gel makes for a comfortable shoe all day.
customer_reviews.author: MCB3602

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: TOTALLY IN LOVE WITH THESE SHOES WANT THEM IN EVERY COLOR AVAILABLE!!
customer_reviews.author: Crissie Boggs

customer_reviews.title: Asics are always so well made and quality consistent I ...
customer_reviews.text: Asics are always so well made and quality consistent I always go back to them
customer_reviews.author: john sarage

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes, it took a few wears to break them in, but even now, I can't wear them for longer than a couple of hours without them bothering me. They are tight across the foot at it's widest point. I expect that on my right foot where there is a slight bunyon starting but my left foot which never has any problems is bothered as well. I'm a little disappointed with these for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine G Mendoza

product_meta.title: ASICS Women's Gel-Evate 2-W Running Shoes Black;Pink 3.5 UK
product_meta.description: The Asics Gel-Evate 2 Athletic feature a Synthetic upper with a Round Toe. The Man-Made outsole lends lasting traction and wear.
feature_bullets: Lace-up running shoe featuring technical components for luxurious ride
Plush FluidRide midsole with GEL cushioning
